tool_description: The D7 Number Lookup API allows you to retrieve various details associated with a given phone number, including the carrier name, country code, number type (landline or mobile), and other relevant information.
name: D7 Number Validator
title: D7 Number Validator

api_list.name: Validate Number
api_list.description: Using this endpoint get detailed information about the phone number, including the carrier name, country code, number type (landline or mobile), and other relevant details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-number-validator.p.rapidapi.com/hlr/v1/lookup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-number-validator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-number-validator.p.rapidapi.com/hlr/v1/lookup"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-number-validator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
